Hero.SubTitle: Let's fight internet censorship together!
Notice.Paste: Note: If you have a long list of URLs to add, you can copy them and paste into one of the boxes below.
Share.Twitter.Tweet: Run OONI Probe to test for censorship!
WhatCanYouDoText.WebCensorship: Generate a link and share it with your friends and contacts around the world. Encourage them to run OONI Probe to test the sites of your choice!
Modal.Heading.ShareThisURL: Share this URL with your friends
Modal.Heading.EmbedThisCode: Or embed this code on your website
Nettest.Heading.HaveMobileApp: You already have the OONI Probe mobile app
Nettest.Text.HaveMobileApp: Tap Run and open this link with your OONI Probe mobile app to start the test.
Nettest.Heading.InstallApp: Install the OONI Probe mobile app
Nettest.Text.InstallApp: Currently, OONI Run links only work with the OONI Probe mobile app.
Test.WebConnectivity.Name: Web Connectivity
Test.HTTPInValidRequestLine.Name: HTTP Invalid Request Line
Test.HTTPHeaderFieldManipulation.Name: HTTP Header Field Manipulation
Test.NDT.Name: NDT Speed Test
Test.Dash.Name: DASH Video Streaming
Test.NDT.Description: Measure the speed and performance of your network.
WhatCanYouDoText.NetNeutrality: Generate a link and share it with your friends and contacts around the world. Encourage them to run OONI Probe to measure the speed and performance of their networks!
WhatCanYouDoText.Middleboxes: Generate a link and share it with your friends and contacts around the world. Encourage them to run OONI Probe to find middleboxes in their networks!
WhatCanYouDoText.Generic: Generate a link and share it with your friends and contacts around the world.
Sidebar.Text.Learn: Learn how this test works here
